item.title: Chocolate Chips Cookies
item.author: nicolmartinezm99@gmail.com (Anthony & Nicole)
item.description: The thickest cookies, with the perfect amount of sugar, and they are easy and fast to make? Is this even possible? Yes it is. I am going to show you how, right now. Chocolate Chip Cookies This is not just another cookie recipe, this is the healthier, thickest, and coolest chewiest cookie I could ever made, after a few try and fail I came out with what for us is the perfect cookie,there was a time in December that I went crazy making this cookies everytime I could, I mean what is better for a sweet fast treat than a cup of milk and two cookies.
